snippet.title: KINGDOM HEARTS HD 2.5 ReMIX - E3 Trailer
snippet.description:
This trailer opens up with memorable scenes from KINGDOM HEARTS HD 1.5 ReMIX, and leads into key highlights, scenarios and gameplay from KINGDOM HEARTS II FINAL MIX, KINGDOM HEARTS Birth by Sleep FINAL MIX and cinematics from KINGDOM HEARTS: Re:coded. Additionally, the storyline of KINGDOM HEARTS III is hinted at the end of the trailer.
 
KINGDOM HEARTS HD 2.5 ReMIX will release in North America, December 2nd and 5th December 2014 in Europe, exclusively on the PlayStation®3. 
 
The legacy of KINGDOM HEARTS continues with three magical journeys in one package in KINGDOM HEARTS HD 2.5 ReMIX:
 
·         KINGDOM HEARTS 2 FINAL MIX
·         KINGDOM HEARTS Birth by Sleep FINAL MIX
·         KINGDOM HEARTS Re:coded (HD remastered cinematics)

For more information about KINGDOM HEARTS HD 2.5 ReMIX, please visit www.kingdomhearts.com. 

Like KINGDOM HEARTS at www.facebook.com/kingdomhearts.

Follow KINGDOM HEARTS at www.twitter.com/kingdomhearts.

© Disney Developed by SQUARE ENIX. SQUARE ENIX and the SQUARE ENIX logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of the Square Enix Group.
